content: Keeness of Tiger is one of the main Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong's Yellow Wind Ridge area. It is a mandatory item you will come across throughout the chapter, as you need it to progress towards the chapter's final boss: the Yellow Wind Sage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeness_of_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Keeness of Tiger'.
The content is as follows:
Keeness of Tiger is one of the main Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong's Yellow Wind Ridge area. It is a mandatory item you will come across throughout the chapter, as you need it to progress towards the chapter's final boss: the Yellow Wind Sage.
